artifactDefinition.businessDescription: This property set includes the information about the durability or permanence of a sequestration method used to store carbon. For carbon removals, durability is a property that will have a significant impact on price. The values in this property set provides the data required to determine a carbon removals long term sequestration promises.
artifactDefinition.businessExample: Nature based, soil, forestry, etc., carbon removals typically have a shorter term and more volatile durability, where technical solutions, DAC, etc. will typically have a longer term, stable durability.

influencedBySymbols.description: Roles should be used to control what accounts can set durability.

outputParameters.name: Durability
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the Durability values - see control file durability.proto.

inputParameters.name: Durability
inputParameters.valueDescription: Set the Durability values - see control file durability.proto.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: Returning the value of the set request.

properties.name: Storage
properties.valueDescription: A selection from a list of storage types, ex. see the durability.proto enumeration of types.

properties.name: Years
properties.valueDescription: The length in years the carbon is expected to be sequestered for.

properties.name: Degradable
properties.valueDescription: If or when degradation of the sequestration can be expected.

properties.name: Percentage
properties.valueDescription: A 0 = no degradation possible, 100 = all sequestered should be expected to be released

properties.name: Factor
properties.valueDescription: The factor of 25 = .25 per year if linear or exponential starts at 25% of durability years.

properties.name: DegradationType
properties.valueDescription: A selection from a list of degradation types, ex. see the durability.proto enumeration of types.

properties.name: ReversalMitigation
properties.valueDescription: For removals the risk of reversal needs to be defined and a mitigation strategy should be identified.

properties.name: ReversalRisk
properties.valueDescription: A selection from durability.proto - low, mid, high
